alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:20PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Collier County through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Golden Gate Estates, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Orangetree, Golden Gate, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, East Naples, Lely Resort, Pelican Bay, Picayune Strand State Forest, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd and Quail Creek Estate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
